type: Legendary Creature – Human Nomad lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]Engage![/i] – {G}{W}{W} [i](You may put this card under another legendary creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Double strike
[i]Astra Storm[/i] – Whenever Lyn, Emblem of Blazing, engages or attacks with two other creatures, up to one other creature gains double strike until end of turn. Other creatures you control gain first strike until end of turn.
